result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian L Mallam was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Forgery-Uttering, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.38(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: paid directly to COC from bail bond money
No contact with Ms. Sousek unless she consents
Comply with all conditions DOC may impose

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brian L Mallam

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: for Termination from Drug & Alcohol Court
State's Discovery Response
Memo to file
copy of PSI to both Atty's
Status hrg or plea on August 25, 2014 at 11:00 am.
copy of competency eval report to both atty's
Dr. Minter
Status conference on August 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Also has 13 CM 213, 14 CF 18, 14 CF 37, 14 CF 48 and 14 CF 52.  9:25 AM Court calls cases and appearances.  Atty Gramstrup makes stmt - raises the issue of competency to assist.  Court will order custodial evaluation by Dr. Minter.  If trial in Sawyer is not resolved this case to be rescheduled.  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on June 23, 2014 at 09:15 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State. Court calls case and appearances, also has 14CF17, 14CF18, 14CF37, 14CF48, 14CF52.  Atty Gramstrup speaks to the court and requests a reset with status.  Bail will continue.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2014 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on June 2, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court with attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Defendant Brian L Mallam in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and appearances. Mr. Mallam has waived his right to a preliminary exam. Court speaks to Mr. Mallam regarding the preliminary exam. Court finds that the defendant has freely and knowingly waived his right to a preliminary exam.  Court finds that there is probable cause and that the defendant has commited a crime in Washburn County. Waived reading. Defendant enters plea of not guilty. 
Atty Gramstrup speaks to the court about releasing Mr. Mallam.  The state objects to this matter. The court agrees.  Court will amend bail. $1,000.00 cash, and Mr. Mallam must go to the Compassion Connection Facility if bailed out. If it does not work there, he goes back to jail.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 1, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court, in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case. No appearance by Attorney Gramstrup. Court calls PD Office and also calls Atty Gramstrup's office to schedule.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 1, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on April 23, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court, in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived reading.  Bail in 14 CT 23 to apply to this case also.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 23, 2014 at 11:00 am.
